overview: Alex Pasechnik is a technology entrepreneur who loves to create products. Past experience includes working in different software companies, building teams for product development and co-founding startups. He is currently a CTO of the FunnelScope, a lab focused on building next generation products using natural language processing, big data, and voice. Prior to FunnelScope he was the CTO of New-York based EvText (www.evtext.com), a company which develops different information retrieval products based on text-mining algorithms. Before EvText he founded Vzaemozalik and FinexPay, domestic Ukrainian companies which were build to solve the issues of lacking needed financial tools on the market.
